CustomField.description: Email address of the main POC the CSM is managing a relationship with at the brand level. This user will also receive all relevant Journey Orchestrator comm via Gainsight.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Email address of the main POC the CSM is managing a relationship with at the brand level. This user will also receive all relevant Journey Orchestrator comm via Gainsight.
CustomField.label: Main POC Email Address
